headline: International Business Machines (IBM) Cut to Hold on Weak Consulting Growth and Infrastructure Slowdown
summary: International Business Machines Corporation (NYSE:IBM) is one the Top 10 AI Stocks in Focus on Wall Street. On February 18, Erste Group analyst Hans Engel downgraded IBM (NYSE: IBM) from Buy to Hold. Despite IBM’s positive AI outlook, the firm has flagged slowing infrastructure momentum for the stock, weak consulting growth, and financial pressures. These factors, […]
